# Download new Reposilite

    curl -o reposilite.jar https://repo.panda-lang.org/releases/org/panda-lang/reposilite/${REPOSILITE_VERSION}/reposilite-${REPOSILITE_VERSION}-all.jar
else
    curl -o reposilite.jar https://repo.panda-lang.org/releases/org/panda-lang/reposilite/${REPOSILITE_VERSION}/reposilite-${REPOSILITE_VERSION}.jar
